description_carte: Aquarius brings not salvation, but a flood of despair. His waters drown all hope.
description_visuelle: A humanoid figure draped in seaweed and decaying cloth. Water streams endlessly from a cracked urn he carries. His face is obscured by barnacles and coral.

skills.name: Tidal Surge
skills.description: Unleashes a powerful wave, damaging the target and reducing their VIT.

skills.name: Drowning Grasp
skills.description: Attempts to drown the target, dealing damage over time.

skills.name: Murky Veil
skills.description: Creates a veil of murky water, increasing DEF for a short time.

skills.name: Abyssal Torrent
skills.description: Summons a massive torrent from the deep, dealing massive damage to all enemies.
